summary: Gamma Designer feature: Backend API fully functional (8/8 tests pass), Frontend button NOT rendering. The POST /api/gamma-designer endpoint works correctly with all test cases. However, the 'Gamma Match Designer' button that should appear in the Feed Match section when Gamma feed is selected is NOT being rendered to the DOM at all.

ui_bugs.issue: The TouchableOpacity element at lines 1557-1567 containing 'Gamma Match Designer' button is NOT rendering to DOM even though inputs.feed_type === 'gamma' should be true. The button should appear between the Feed Match toggle and Feedline/Power section but it's completely missing from the rendered HTML.

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access Gamma Designer modal because the button that opens it doesn't render

action_items: FIX: The Gamma Match Designer button at index.tsx lines 1556-1567 is not rendering. The conditional {inputs.feed_type === 'gamma' && (...)} should render the button but it doesn't appear in DOM.
INVESTIGATE: Possible SSR/hydration issue or React Native Web rendering issue with conditionally rendered TouchableOpacity
VERIFY: Ensure inputs.feed_type state is correctly set to 'gamma' at render time
critical_code_review_comments: The button code at lines 1556-1567 looks syntactically correct but doesn't render. This needs investigation.
The conditional rendering pattern {condition && <Component>} may have an issue with React Native Web SSR

success_rate.frontend: 0% (button not rendering, modal cannot be tested)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend gamma-designer API is fully working. Frontend GammaDesigner.tsx component exists and looks correct. The issue is that the button to open it (in index.tsx lines 1556-1567) is not being rendered to the DOM even though it should be visible when feed_type is 'gamma'.

backend_test_results.test_custom_hardware_warning: PASSED - 1" tube/0.5" rod gives ID/rod ratio warning
backend_test_results.test_custom_feedpoint_impedance: PASSED - 30Ω feedpoint gives different bar than default 20Ω
backend_test_results.test_bar_sweep_valid: PASSED - bar_sweep array has valid ascending data
backend_test_results.test_insertion_sweep_valid: PASSED - insertion_sweep array has valid ascending data
backend_test_results.test_invalid_geometry_error: PASSED - Tube ID < rod OD returns error message
backend_test_results.test_calculate_regression: PASSED - /api/calculate still works with geometric K model

rca_of_issue: The React Native Web application renders the Feed Match section but skips the conditionally rendered Gamma Designer button. The DOM shows Feed Match > Toggle > Feedline/Power with no button in between. Possible causes: 1) State timing issue where feed_type isn't set when the conditional is evaluated, 2) React Native Web rendering quirk with conditional TouchableOpacity, 3) SSR hydration mismatch. Recommended fix: Check if the button renders on native mobile, try wrapping in a View, or use a different conditional pattern.
